name: jennifer-a-mallette
body:
## Welcome to Summer of Code!
This summer, we are calling for actionable, innovative projects led by a series of lunch and learn talks throughout the globe. Technology is moving at a fast pace, and we want keep our minds fresh to keep up! We also want the opportunity to explore projects we are passionate about and investigate new technologies un-related to our day-to-day work. This kind of thinking will one day tackle some of the world's biggest social issues.

## Upcoming Talks
### 07/13/2018: [Quantum Computing by Andrew Wack](https://pages.github.ibm.com/live-advisor/summer-of-code/quantum.html) 
Come hear about the new exciting technology IBM is working on that will change coding in the future, and how you can play with it now!

### 07/20/2018: [Blockchain](https://pages.github.ibm.com/live-advisor/summer-of-code/blockchain.html)
